The statement from Boeing: s spokesman, Dan Curran, confirming that the effect on jobs from the policy reversal would be minimal or non-existent.
The confirmation from Boeing CEO Dennis: indicating that they had planned for the possibility of the U.S. backing out of the Iran nuclear deal.
The analysis from financial publication: com, which pointed out that it was too early to determine the impact of the policy reversal on Boeing and the economy as a whole.
The opinion of analysts from Bernstein: who suggested that there may be a chance for Boeing to profit from the fallout of the Iran nuclear deal, particularly in terms of increased demand for defense products in the Middle East.
